metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23922 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in giflib through 5.1.4. DumpScreen2RGB in gif2rgb.c has a heap-based buffer over-read.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no fix available from the upstream developers as of 2023-09-15

criterions.comment: giflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
